items.title: “The team was expected to arrive in Dar es Salaam early Monday morning and went directly into camp. There is no time to rest because our focus now is on domestic competitions,” “According to our programme, we return to action on Wednesday night when we face KMC in a Premier League match on April 11”

“The bigger picture is that the port developments fall broadly within China's Belt and Road Initiative and also implementation of the country's five year plans has laid an emphasis on connectivity across the BRI,”

“We are extremely proud of the accomplishments of these players and the Nigeria Tennis Federation. We commend everyone who worked tirelessly to organise a fantastic tournament that ultimately ended in success for Nigeria with the promotion we earned,” “This achievement comes at a time of renewed enthusiasm for sports in the country, driven by the strong commitment of Mr President. It reflects our belief that Nigerian sports is firmly on the right track”

"Thousands and thousands of Italians are working at these very hours to make sure everything runs smoothly during the Olympics(...) Then there are them: the enemies of Italy and of Italians, who protest 'against the Olympics,' ensuring that these images end up on television screens around half the world -- after others have cut railway cables to prevent trains from running,"
“Just because I’m wearing the flag doesn’t mean I represent everything that’s going on in the US,”

“Together with my wife Zsuzsa, we had the opportunity to visit the Hungarian athletes and – without disturbing them in their preparations – gain a brief insight into where and how they are spending their time here. We were also able to get a brief impression of the unmistakable Olympic atmosphere surrounding the competitors! Go Hungary!”
“Grande uomo di scienza, l’Italia perde un punto riferimento”

“Ho cercato di fare il mio esordio al meglio che potevo. Durante la gara non pensavo a niente. L’unica cosa che ricordo è che negli ultimi due giri ho ragionato che avrei potuto battere il record olimpico ed ero abbastanza gasato. E’ andata com’è andata e sono veramente felice”

“Le Giornate di Raccolta del Farmaco sono un gesto semplice, ma essenziale per tante persone fragili che, per ragioni economiche, non si curano in modo adeguato. Chiediamo a chiunque ne abbia la possibilità di partecipare. Per rispondere a un bisogno concreto, ma anche perché, in un mondo in cui le preoccupazioni sono tante e complesse, e la condizione economica di migliaia di famiglie italiane sempre più fragile, si avverte con forza il bisogno che emergano segni di speranza, come scegliere di entrare in farmacia per compiere un gesto di gratuità”
“Le città del futuro si progettano partendo dal suolo,”
